author: Alexander Balchev
comment: Hey,  guys, in one of the recent events the app lost its functionality to show me ALL events for a given day. I don't want to be presented with only selected events, I want to check them all. The only way to do is to use the Explore and click on every single little icon on the map.. Am I missing something or is this functionality gone from the app? :/

reply.author: Clusterize
reply.content:
Hi Alexander

Thanks for the feedback. Have you tried to use the "Search for all events" after clicking the magnifier icon? You should be able to see everything that is happening around you in that way. We would think of a better way to make this more visible. Once again, thanks for the feedback! We hope you revise your rating

Best,
The Craze Team

title: Removed All Events in a recent update

author: Dilyana Evtimova
comment: Craze is great - it shows only the events I will be interested at. Everything from party to culture and fashion. The best features is buying tickets straight away from the app. It saves me a lot of time and the tickets are cheaper ;)
title: The events I want to see

author: Robbert van het Bolscher
comment: Tried it and showed me spanish events even though I was in sofia. Tried update, error 403 but all other apps work. Same thing after I removed and tried to reinstall, installed a random other app just to see if the issue is with my phone but its not

reply.author: Clusterize
reply.content: Hi Robbert, we are sorry that you had bad experience! Is your GPS turned on? Can you send us more info and screenshots at support@getcraze.co? We will try to find the cause of the issue and fix it, so you can enjoy the events in Sofia :)

title: Doest work well
